Comment: The advantage Pritzker has over every other potential candidate is he is the easiest to understand, and he’s very relatable.   High school, some high school, college, some college, advanced degree, ESL people, everyone in between… they can understand Pritzker.   He talks simply. Might be strange to think that is a key component to electability, but it is.   A vote here or there, in the rust belt. In south Florida. In an industrial town. At a union event. Etc…  All those votes add up and really, really, matter in terms of the electoral college.   For that reason alone, he’d be a very prudent choice for the Party.
Author: -Gramsci-
